Reviews.Title: Super easy time saver
Reviews.Author: Richard C. Nichols "whereisrich"
Reviews.Content: This was my first install. Simply does what it says. I used it with a Viper 5901 and the xk09 in my 09 Silverado. This took 10 sec to set in place. Fits nicely under the steering clumn.

ProductInfo.Features:
RF loops from Xpresskit are an all new line of preloaded RF transponder rings that can be plugged into the DLPK module and allow it to operate as a combo door lock and transponder bypass solution
Preloaded RF transponder ring compatible with: Optimax series DLPK moduleIncludes (1) Pre-wired 2nd Gen Chrysler & GM PASSKEY3+ RFID Transponder and antenna ring.
